website_summaries.verdict: One of the best solutions for a great amount of storage in the home office or elsewhere in the home.
pros: Adjustable shelving makes it easy to organize the cabinet to your personal office needs
Easy to access large and small items at the same time
cons: Difficult to fit into smaller home offices

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy but ok
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was wacky. It arrived half hanging out of the no-longer closed box. Our nestcam caught the ups guy literally rolling this 7foot box up the driveway like a boulder. I'm 5'4 145lbs and I just picked it up and slid it. This does ok for rake storage, etc, but it is plastic, so we'll see how it holds up. Not exactly structurally sound, especially if you don't install the shelves. By the way, the shelves don't seem adjustable as the notches in the photos suggest. There are two permanent slots.
customer_reviews.author: AmRvwr

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative
customer_reviews.text: We bought 3. Plastic is strong enough for our use. We didn't want to spend a lot. Husband and wife assembled them when husband could not participate due to surgery. Wife could have assembled them easier without supervision, but they finally got together. It's a definite improvement in our garage. We loaded them with totes and labeled the totes and now are praying that they get used instead of previous habits!
customer_reviews.author: ned1644

customer_reviews.title: 3rd Suncast storage unit I've ordered.
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first two Suncast Lockers in Costco, Celaya, Mexico 5 years ago and they have held up wonderfully. I desperately needed another one but could not find the exact same model anywhere. I believe the first two were intended for outdoor use. They sit in my laundry room which is indoors in that the ceiling is the translucent policarbonate material. At certain times of year they got some sun and it gets very warm. My new Suncast , which is intended for indoors will be in the same location. I trust it will hold up as well as the first two
customer_reviews.author: ARM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These cabinets go together in just a few minutes. They are strong and spacious. Perfect for garden tools, or towels for the pool. They are dry inside. The doors close tightly with the latch on the top and bottom of door. The height is also great. I use them for storage and a bit of privacy from neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mckay Jones

customer_reviews.title: Suncast Storage Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice, sturdy cabinet. Will hold a lot of things. I use mine for canning storage and my husband uses his for tools. They hold a lot and are very easy to assemble. I expect this to last for years and years. I have the wall cabinets in my barn for horse storage and they have been there for years. You can't go wrong with this product/
customer_reviews.author: MAC

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best “plastic cabinets” I have ever had. It has two locking mechanisms, one on top and one on bottom. This keep the bugs and critters out very well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rose

customer_reviews.title: My Second Time
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet is well designed and is sturdy. Assembly is fairly straight forward, and requires basically a Phillips screwdriver and a mallet. This is my second cabinet, with the first having been purchased a year ago. It is built to last. Home delivery is wonderful! The box is large, and wouldn't have fit in my car had I bought it locally.
customer_reviews.author: Lalo

customer_reviews.title: Great Storage Cabinets
customer_reviews.text: I have several pieces of Suncast storage units in my garage and love them. Pros: clean look, neutral colors, sturdy, flexible shelving, not too difficult to assemble Cons: instructions are not detailed enough regarding placement and securing of the top section of the unit
customer_reviews.author: homer

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This storage cabinet is as advertised. It was easy to install, follow the directions each step of the way. Do not try to skip a step!!!! I've also installed two wall mounted cabinets and two 'mega' cabinets. I've ordered two base units and will order two more of the mega units. Only the 'mega' units will need two people to assemble it, but it only takes about 15 minutes to assemble. Again, follow the instructions. Great quality and very durable. I don't know how water tight they are as I'm using them in my garage. Yes I'll recommend any of these units. Great idea and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Assembly wasn't bad. Put it together myself in about an hour
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Assembly wasn't bad. Put it together myself in about an hour. Wish it were a bit sturdier, but for the price it'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: M R

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdy and locks for security of supplies
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to store supplies for our church nursery. It's sturdy and locks for security of supplies. It was easy to put together and the shelves are adjustable to a degree. It worked well for our purposes. Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Sheek

customer_reviews.title: Highly functional supports weights listed in description.
customer_reviews.text: Shelves are sturdy and the plastic will probably outlast humanity, so construction wise I have no complaints. The included wall anchors you are supposed to use are pretty one dimensional in that they assume a hollow wall, but you cause the provided screw and a washer if you have wood to mount to. Concrete I would buy a couple of concrete screws and anchors.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together, sturdy and attractive.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, sturdy and attractive. I have it in my garden shed and it makes being organized, finding stuff and working in the garden much easier. This is my second one. The other is for brooms and rakes and tall tools.
customer_reviews.author: J. Copeland

customer_reviews.title: Great for garage
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for the garage. Nice size and fairly easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation. Solid outdoor storage.
customer_reviews.text: This Suncast storage cabinet took about 20 minutes to assemble with 2 people. There's not much to it at all. Once assembled, it has a good amount of space with customizable shelf height/placement. It is secure with small children around with multiple locking brackets, and also has pre drilled holes for a lock. Be warned, though - it is easy to tip this over. Wall mounting it, or at least securing this cabinet between or next to other heavy objects is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product at all.
customer_reviews.text: The package came with a deformed (warped door) and the package came open with holes. After spending hours assembling it, turns out the shelves to not fit in properly. We are on the second call to the company to try and return in- and they are having a hard time sending us an email. Additionally we no longer have the packaging (since it was torn in the first place).
customer_reviews.author: grazyna naggiar

customer_reviews.title: It arrived missing all of the hardware. No handles ...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived missing all of the hardware. No handles or hardware for the shelves. Had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon

customer_reviews.title: Can’t lock the door properly
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Unfortunately, the door is unable to lock due to design flaw. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Suits my needs perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I like the locks on it. The children can’t reach it to unlock it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much sturdier than I expected and better than my old one because it was so easy ...
customer_reviews.text: Much sturdier than I expected and better than my old one because it was so easy to assemble. I’m considering purchasing 2 more for my basement
customer_reviews.author: TicaRican

customer_reviews.title: Fairly Decent Storage Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Seems quite solid, fairly neutral color. I wish the brand weren't on it so visibly, for what should be a more presentable piece by your home. The recessed part for a lock is a little narrow for my padlock, but it still just fits, though has to stick out a bit instead of hanging naturally. Chipmunks/squirrels smelling the birdseed inside have gnawed away at the door along the bottom latch and the side hinge. They haven't gotten all the way through yet, so I used some powder and spray that's supposed to deter rodents. Lawn furniture pillows in the top push the top of the cabinet up a bit -- the top latch still latches, although just barely.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: The assembly instructions were very clear and easy to follow except for the door latches
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived on schedule. The assembly instructions were very clear and easy to follow except for the door latches. That can be attributed to my lack of understanding the sketches.Be sure to read the instructions through before starting to assemble. This is a very sturdy cabinet and I will probably purchase another one in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Foley

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: It’s good I like it but the price is not
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for the organization and "hiding" of clutter in the garage. I was told by my friend that my garage was more "decorated" than the inside of her home
customer_reviews.author: OCDoctor

customer_reviews.title: Great cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: great little storage cabinet, inside cabinets are STRONG! we use it to store cases of pop and water and it holds them without a problem. May be buying another soon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: poor quality all around. latches dont work - stick. Shelves fall out
customer_reviews.text: Junk - poor quality all around. latches dont work - stick. Shelves fall out with little to no weight. For $475 was expecting better product.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Little

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, you need two people to build and ...

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed

customer_reviews.title: Great storage unit!

customer_reviews.title: Missing door latches and a inside shelf, I guess ...
customer_reviews.text: Missing door latches and a inside shelf , I guess I have to return item! The box was rippled open, I'm assuming for that's where the parts I needed fell out. Is it possible just to have those parts shipped ?

customer_reviews.title: Cabinet perfect to hold all laundry supplies in my laundry room.
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet was easy to assemble and very sturdy. Shelves are sturdy. We are very pleased with the quality of this cabinet. So glad we ordered it.

customer_reviews.title: suncast tall storage cabinet sturdy holds a lot of weight.
customer_reviews.text: well built sturdy a great deal. this is the sturdiest one i have every owned. shelves can hold a lot of weight. great item. i love it.

customer_reviews.text: While the cabinet itself is OK, it arrived quite scuffed and damaged from shipping. The parts still fit together, just some parts look bad. Also, I found the locks to be a bit cheap.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and the shelves are strong
customer_reviews.text: It assembled perfectly. Each large piece is numbered to aid in assembly. It is not rain proof but certainly will be rain resistant to a large degree. Very sturdy and the shelves are strong.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: this was pretty easy to put together except for the locks. they were very hard to figure out and actually put together.

customer_reviews.title: Well pleased
customer_reviews.text: A very well made cabinet. Met my needs perfectly. We'll see how it handles a cold Nebraska winter.
customer_reviews.author: Old Timer

customer_reviews.title: Great storage
customer_reviews.text: Very simple and quick to put together- great for our pool area
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: this is a good cabinet to get
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cabinet to store tools. Although it can be padlocked, it isn't difficult to gain entry. If it's used for general storage, this is a good cabinet to get.
customer_reviews.author: dickinson65

customer_reviews.title: Great storage and looks nice but the only complaint I ...
customer_reviews.text: Great storage and looks nice but the only complaint I would have is the shelving. They should lock into place and not jump out of its position. You have to make sure the sides are push in to make the secure shelving position. Please do yourself a favor and do not attempt to go beyond the recommended weight for each shelf. I think your best bet is to always be under the actual rating. Its still a nice storage system to clean up an area and get back some of the space for safety sake.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Medina

customer_reviews.title: ... didn't work correctly and company sent replacement all works good now and I am happy with
customer_reviews.text: one latch didn't work correctly and company sent replacement all works good now and I am happy with product
customer_reviews.author: Lindy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Love my shed. Easy to put together, sturdy, just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together, really, not kidding. This product came quickly and in excellent condition ! We want a rust proof cabinet for garden chemicals that we could lock. This is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was on time. Easy to assemble. Solid design. Good features. Will buy again from this manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: not so good
customer_reviews.text: over priced for what it is and hard to assemble. wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Susan F.

customer_reviews.title: Was not as sturdy as I would of liked
customer_reviews.text: Was not as sturdy as I would of liked. The locking system on the right door is difficult to close on the top. Serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Dechant

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet is wonderful. It is sturdy and since I wanted it for the garage NO rust. I like this cabinet for its versatility I just ordered another one. I am a 62 year old female and had no problems putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: JO

customer_reviews.title: Multi-function and Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is the best money I have spent in a while. The assembly is super easy, it is very durable and I like how the shelves adjust in height. My only hang up with the product is it needs a safety hook or apparatus on the back that you could fasten it to a wall just in case the kids decide to use it as a jungle gym. We are using it on our game room for the pool sticks and board games
customer_reviews.author: Max Bush

customer_reviews.title: As advertised, and a good value.
customer_reviews.text: These cabinets (I bought 3 different sizes: the tall, the base and the wall-hung) are perfect for my purposes: general garage storage. Assembly is very easy, the quality of the construction is quite good and the product seems tough. (Some competitive products from Sterilite and Home Depot's house brand have single-layer plastic walls, which looks fragile.) As others have stated, the shelf height is not adjustable (except for the tall cabinet, which allows some limited adjustment), and you have to make sure to follow the assembly directions. But, with those caveats, they are just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Perfesser

customer_reviews.title: Best Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Best cabinet that will not rust. Easy to assemble, well thought out and durable. Door handles are a little hard to put in place and stay in place but you can back them up with tape on the inside. Shelves are sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Marie C.

customer_reviews.title: This cabinet is sturdy, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet is sturdy, easy to assemble, and super functional. Each shelf is supported across the back and on both sides, and also has a metal bar spanning the underside of the shelf front to prevent sagging. With just a bit of leveling to account for a 'less-than-perfectly-level garage floor', these cabinets stand straight and tightly aligned with each other. I bought three cabinets and would like to have purchased a fourth. Unfortunately the lowest priced supplier is now charging 33% more than I paid just a month ago ($199.93 vs. $149.99).
customer_reviews.author: rachelle

customer_reviews.title: It stands there and takes it, all of your ...
customer_reviews.text: It stands there and takes it, all of your garage storage needs. Never complains, never slacks off, just keeps on storing.
customer_reviews.author: Michal

customer_reviews.title: Damaged doors.
customer_reviews.text: When I got the package, it was damaged and the doors were bent. I didn't realize it, until I started to assemble it. By that time, it was too late to send it back, and I am too old to take it to UPS. I am very disappointed in the condition, so I will use it without the doors.
customer_reviews.author: jim Nickens

customer_reviews.title: Nice cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy, easy to assemble, it's mostly water tight, but not 100% mine is on a deck, under and awning. So far love it, will buy another.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This is very sturdy and really easy to put together. The only thing I had some trouble with was putting on the door handles. I had one installed and the other wouldn't snap in, so I just reversed them and it worked fine. I'm very happy with this cabinet and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: ewefluffy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cabinet for the garage
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, just what I needed to help organize my garage. I didn't want metal or particle board. Comes in a very large box, You will need help getting it into the garage. Took me about 30 minutes to assemble, everything fit well. Probably a two person job to assemble (an extra pair of hands helps with the large pieces). Feels sturdy, not cheap or flimsy. Lots of space. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Bob826

customer_reviews.title: I like the way is has slide locks on one side ...

Doorhandles and locks suck and do not assemble and fit all that great, but still giving 5 stars as the overall package is solid and lets face it, this sits behind the house with junk you need but do not want in the garage like paint.

product_meta.title: Suncast Base Storage Cabinet - Resin Construction for Garage Storage - 72" Garage Organizer with Shelving and Holds up to 75lbs. - Platinum Doors & Slate Top
product_meta.description: Suncast Garage Storage shatters the notion that garage organization needs to be metal to be strong and durable. The Suncast Tall Storage Cabinet is engineered from heavy-duty, blow-molded resin and stands up to whatever you throw in it - or at it. Constructed with reinforced, adjustable shelving and lockable handles, it protects equipment and gear and keeps dangerous tools and equipment safely stored out of the way. Plus, the resin housing is resilient to warping, rusting or denting, but is lightweight to make set-up easy. Also, unlike other products with bulky, squared-off edges, Suncast products have a sleek design that elevates the garage environment, creating an attractive space. For those serious about their garage, Suncast Garage Storage is the serious solution.
feature_bullets: OUTDOOR STORAGE: Base storage cabinet to contain toys, tools, and equipment
DURABLE: Double wall resin construction that is resistant to warping, rusting, and denting
SLEEK DESIGN: Platinum storage cabinet that fits into the corner of a garage, creating an attractive space
REINFORCED SHELVING: Metal reinforced shelving that holds up to 75 lbs.
LOCKABLE DOORS: Doors are capable of locking to protect your valuables

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars174 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
